name: United States
descr: The United States of America is a country primarily located in North America.

name: United Kingdom
descr: The United Kingdom is a country located off the northwestern coast of the European mainland.

name: Japan
descr: Japan is an island country in East Asia, located in the northwest Pacific Ocean.

name: India
descr: India, officially the Republic of India, is a country in South Asia.

name: Australia
descr: Australia, officially the Commonwealth of Australia, is a sovereign country comprising the mainland of the Australian continent.
